email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

We are pleased to offer MV SEA HORIZON for your 12,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Freight rate is $42/MT CIF. Laycan: 1-5 December. Vessel details: DWT 75,000, LOA 225m. Demurrage $15,000/day.

Kind regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you revise to $38/MT?

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of $40/MT CIF. This is our best and final offer.

Kind regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

We can accept $40/MT provided the laycan is extended to 1-7 December. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Owners have agreed to extend the laycan to 1-7 December. Please confirm acceptance of the terms so we can proceed with the recap.

Kind regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Confirmed at $40/MT CIF with laycan 1-7 December. Please send the recap.

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 12,000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: $40/MT CIF
- Laycan: 1-7 December
- Demurrage: $15,000/day

Kind regards,
Sarah Johnson
